mmu.ac.transportwebapp

Class MainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • mmu.ac.transportwebapp.MainActivity

  • public class MainActivity
extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MainActivity.getStationsByLocationAsyncTask
      Here is the async function that triggers on button click, This task needs lat and lng so pass them through as multiple args, The doInBackground runs on the background thread and can't update the UI so when finished pass the arraylist of the stations to onPostExecute to display the stations info

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void change_display(View v)
      This changes the display from the mapbox to the textbased display
      void display_stations(java.util.ArrayList<Station> stations)
      Here I display the arraylist of Stations I create a TableRow to be inserted into the TableLayout inside the scrollview I also create textViews to be inserted inside the TableRows to display the name and distance away I also add the map marker into the mapbox so that when the user views the mapbox then camera will follow and correctly display the markers within the bounds
      protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) 
      void onMapReady(com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap mapboxMap)
      Set the type of mapbox display and get the latest stations results based on the GPS location
      void onStart() 
      void stations_refresh_onClick(View v)
      Here I call the AsyncTask to execute the getStationsBylocation class which displays the stations

      • display_stations

        public void display_stations(java.util.ArrayList<Station> stations)
        Here I display the arraylist of Stations I create a TableRow to be inserted into the TableLayout inside the scrollview I also create textViews to be inserted inside the TableRows to display the name and distance away I also add the map marker into the mapbox so that when the user views the mapbox then camera will follow and correctly display the markers within the bounds
        Parameters:
        stations -
